mapper.select: SELECT dg.id, dg.desc, dg.status, dg.player_num, IF(ISNULL(actual_start_date),estimated_start_date,actual_start_date) AS startDate FROM d_game dg LEFT JOIN d_player dp ON dg.status = 1 AND dp.role='judger' AND dp.game_id=dg.id WHERE dp.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY dg.id LIMIT 1

SELECT du.id AS userId, du.nickname AS nickname, DATE_FORMAT(dp.apply_time,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS applyTime FROM d_user du, d_player dp WHERE dp.role = "player" AND dp.user_id = du.id AND dp.game_id = #{gameId}
SELECT count(1) FROM d_player WHERE user_id = #{userId}
